name: Dreamers (itch) (CE Kinsella)
description:
Dreamers is a GMless and diceless collaborative storytelling game. Come together with your friends to tell silly, scary, and strange tales of your interconnected dreams. Use a standard playing deck to randomly generate themes and twists, pick up where the last dreamer left off, and describe your dream before the alarm goes off -- and you wake to reality.

When you purchase Dreamers, you'll receive a dark mode PDF (Dreamers) as seen in the sidebar, as well as a screen reader-friendly PDF (Dreamers [Screen Reader Version]).
